questions.question: Is it possible to just go around all of this and just for somebody to manufacture at scale tests?

Is it just like with the military, the reason we have civilian leadership when you talk about war?
And they literally just had very fast screening to say, what are the best tests?
What does each household or each person in each household use one test per week?

Is this just words or do you think this is actually going to lead to something?
What, is there something you can say to what people can do, like listening to this, individuals?
And by that, I mean, you and I and most people who are watching this are adults, right?
